name: SYSTEM CURSED
description:
This game, whose real name is SYSTEM C:\ CURSED, is your turn to be cursed as soon as you run it. Your SYSTEM (C:) disk is now cursed. To remove the curse, you need to finish the game.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • W,A,S,D : Movement
  • Left click (hold) : Move Item|Door
  • F : Flashlight on/off
  • Space : Jump

----------------------------------------------------------------------

TEAM

This game was developed by our team of 3 people in an average of 1 month;

Kardelen (Perduuus) - (3D Artist, Composer, SFX Artist)

Eren (Dactarium) - (Coder, Pixel Artist, Level Designer, Scriptwriter)

Berkay (MoonChain) - (Coder, UI Designer, Game Designer,  Scriptwriter)

----------------------------------------------------------------------

DISCORD

We share details about the game, spoilers and easter eggs.

You are invited to the Discord channel to join this adventure; https://discord.gg/tCWywxsjPP

----------------------------------------------------------------------

FOR PLAYING

The game is completely free. You can download and play from the Download section below.

[ TURKISH ]

SİSTEMİNDEKİ LANETTEN KURTUL - KORKU OYUNU

MoonArctic Games

-------------------------------------------------------------------

SYSTEM CURSED HAKKINDA

Asıl adı SYSTEM C:\ CURSED olan bu oyun, çalıştırdığınız anda yıllardır devam eden lanetin sırası size geçer . SYSTEM (C:) diskiniz artık lanetlidir. Laneti kaldırmak için oyunu bitirmeniz gerekir.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

KONTROLLER

  • W,A,S,D : Hareket
  • Sol click (basılı tut) : Eşya|Kapı hareket ettirme
  • F : Fener aç/kapa
  • Space : Zıpla
